programme.desc: Chef Tony Singh and presenter Sophie Morgan compete to make the best holiday snow globes, and TV personality Mark-Francis Vandelli goes head to head with queen of clean Aggie MacKenzie to make intricate jelly art

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Wiltshire mother and daughter Emma and Charlotte have a budget of £100,000 for a holiday home in Antequera in Spain where they hope to spend more quality time together as a family. Jasmine Harman pulls out all the stops to show five suitable properties

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: Two British ice-cream lovers move to France and start churning it out. The owners of a gite complex in the Dordogne have to troubleshoot, and two English artists resort to selling their own home as costs of their B&B build spiral out of control

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole refurbishes a classic Ford Mustang and a neon garage sign, while Simon O'Brien restores a classic Chopper bicycle and turns a bass guitar into a chair

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien head to Nantwich and Stoke-on-Trent, where Henry tarts up a 1960s moped that was once favoured by model Twiggy, and Simon restores an early Mirror dinghy

programme.title: Heir Hunters
programme.desc: The probate researchers look into the case of a former member of the Royal College of Surgeons, and race to discover the rightful owners of his inheritance. The team also investigates the case of a woman whose father was a famous pigeon fancier. Plus, details of some unclaimed estates requiring heirs

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Owner Helen Marriott offers her guest a chance to 'step off the planet' and treats them to essential breathing lessons, a chance to get to know one another in the hot tub, and soul-soothing foot massages at the Fountains Court Holistic Health Hotel in the North Yorkshire resort of Scarborough

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants head to the Whittington & Cat, a pub in Hull that also offers B&B. Proprietor Sue Perkins treats her guests to an afternoon of ice hockey, but they are intrigued by the possible contents of her peculiarly titled breakfast menu

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Khurram Saba hosts the third day of the competition at his Saba Hotel in west London and finds his guests are expecting metropolitan chic, and certainly not fish and chips for dinner. Candida Leaver is extremely displeased when she experiences a sleepless night, while Sue Perkins and Gill take the opportunity to go out and have some fun

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Candida Leaver and Peter Starling, owners of the Bower Inn in Bridgwater, Somerset, play host in the last round of the week. The group activity is willow-weaving, and at dinner time the guests reveal what they think of their no-nonsense hosts

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants meet one last time to learn how much they have been paid by their fellow hoteliers before discovering who has won the week's competition. Old tensions resurface as the results are announced, and there are heated exchanges around the table

programme.title: Love It or List It Australia
programme.desc: Sibon and Gerard live with their two teenage boys in a dilapidated home in the prestigious Sydney suburb of Hunters Hill. Andrew Winter and Neale Whitaker visit their Californian-style bungalow, with its leaky roof, gutters that are falling off, and rooms that are full of mould

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer meet the Farhalls in Windsor, who are unsure whether to sell their four-bedroom detached house or transform the layout of their home. Graham loves living in Windsor but Nardeth is growing tired of their cramped and dated house, and would prefer to look for a new property they could purchase

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau: DIY
programme.desc: Couple Mariam and Johnno arrive at their new chateau with their teenage son Monty and discover that they have no running water and that builders are busy in every room. To get respite from the heat and building work, Mariam visits Angel to get help turning her designs into tiles for her new home. Abbie and her mum Karen have wallpaper decisions to make, and wrangle oversized cots as they continue to get their chateau ready for the biggest wedding party of the season

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Jonathan Broom and his wife Deborah have put everything on hold while he pursues his dream of building a miniature Hollywood Hills-style mansion. They stumble across a scrap of land in north London, but it's fraught with problems and the only way they can complete the £1million home is by sinking half of it six metres below ground. Surrounded on all sides by their neighbours' back gardens, the couple have to dismantle walls and fences and promise to put them back together again, and that's just the start of their difficulties. Kevin McCloud follows their progress

programme.title: The Dog House Australia
programme.desc: Tim and Fiona like the look of plucky Pomeranian Frosty, but at the age of 11, is the dog the right match for the happy new couple? Meanwhile, the staff hope that someone will finally adopt cute kelpie Schnitzel

programme.title: 999: What's Your Emergency?
programme.desc: This edition focuses on how South Yorkshire police tackle the issues of sexual offences, with officers called to a suspected sexual assault outside a nightclub, while in another early-morning incident, officers confront a man after he exposes himself in the street. Call handlers deal with a case of sexual assault on a teen by other teenagers, and a man is arrested on suspicion of domestic rape as a result of a call from his wife

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Thirty-year-old Chris is admitted after sustaining a potentially life-threatening wound during a game with his friend Jack, who fired the inside shaft of a ballpoint pen into his abdomen using an air rifle. programme.title: Fred Dibnah's Made in Britain
programme.desc: The former steeplejack's journey takes him to the North East, where he visits a pumping station that ran for 100 years before ceasing operation in 1967 and travels across the Middlesbrough Transporter Bridge. programme.title: Fred Dibnah's Made in Britain
programme.desc: The former steeplejack fulfils a personal ambition by driving his traction engine across the Scammonden Bridge near Huddersfield, West Yorkshire. He also visits a forge in Sheffield and watches crucible steel being made by the experts at Abbeydale Industrial Hamlet

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on a new journey following his Bradshaw's handbook from the heart of the industrial East Midlands to the island of Lindisfarne off the coast of Northumberland. On the first leg, he gives an old engine a fresh start in the railway hub of Derby, heads to Nottingham to find out about the Victorian origins of a well-known high-street chemist and calls at a historic one-time grocer's shop in Grantham, Lincolnshire

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey from Derby to Lindisfarne, with this leg beginning in Boston, south Lincolnshire, where he explores the connection between the town and its American namesake. At Southwell, Nottinghamshire, he discovers the origins of a favourite Victorian apple before heading into West Yorkshire to visit an imposing institution built in Menston to provide asylum for those with mental health issues. In nearby Wakefield, Michael boards one of Britain's least frequent services, before heading to Hensall, North Yorkshire

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: On the third leg of his journey from London to Newton Abbot, Michael Portillo travels from Taunton to Minehead. Along the way he explores a church, finds out just what it takes to operate a 19th-century signal box and summons all his strength to move a 110-ton steam locomotive

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys

programme.title: Fred Dibnah's Made in Britain
programme.desc: Fred takes his traction engine to an old friend to get it repaired, before meeting a pattern-maker who owns six similar machines and who takes him on a trip to a local foundry. programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo begins this leg of his journey in the East Yorkshire town of Hessle, where he learns about the technology that made the Humber Bridge possible. In nearby Hull, Michael hears from local MP Alan Johnson about anti-slavery campaigner William Wilberforce, before travelling to Scarborough Castle, where the founder of the Quaker movement was once imprisoned. His last stop of the day is York, where he learns what made the city a centre for the sweet-making industry

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo begins the fourth leg of his journey from Derby to Lindisfarne in Middlesbrough, visiting one of the last iron foundries in the town and helping cast a carrot valve for a steam engine. His next stop is Darlington, Co Durham, where he meets the editor of the Northern Echo and finds out about the colourful history of WT Stead, one of his predecessors. Michael then heads to St Paul's monastery in Jarrow, Tyne and Wear, to learn about eighth-century monk the Venerable Bede, known as 'the father of English history', before finishing in Hexham, Northumberland, where he visits a historic ginger beer emporium

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo sets off from Newcastle on the final leg of his journey from Derby to Lindisfarne, finding out about the world's earliest swing bridge and its inventor William Armstrong. He also travels by boat from the port of Seahouses to examine the story of lighthouse keeper's daughter Grace Darling, who, along with her father, rescued nine people from tumultuous seas in 1838. On the Holy Island of Lindisfarne, Michael explores the lime kilns and finds out how Christianity spread from here across northern England in the 7th century

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on a new journey following his Bradshaw's handbook from south-west Wales to Cambridge, beginning in Pembroke Dock, where Queen Victoria's royal yachts were built. In the little market town of Naberth he investigates what caused rebels to dress up as women, later spending the night at an inn in Carmarthen where Horatio Nelson once met Emma Hamilton. programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Teacher Harmy hosts the third night of the competition in and around Essex, hoping to impress her guests by serving up an authentic Punjabi feast

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Recruitment consultant Adam is the fourth to host in and around Essex, and hopes to exceed expectations with a menu of posh nosh at his dad's house

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The last to act as host is 24-year-old recruitment consultant Grace, who hopes to dazzle her guests with a glamorous party, Essex-style. With a menu full of home-made grub and help from her family along the way, it remains to be seen whether Grace has done enough to bag the £1,000

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: A recently married couple seek to mark the next chapter of their lives by buying a holiday apartment together in Fuerteventura, one of Spain's Canary Islands. Jean and Stuart Knight are planning to spend several weeks there every year both on their own and also with family and friends. Ben Hillman shows the pair five options within their budget of £60,000

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Newlyweds Karen and John Leonard from Essex are about to retire. With the last of the six boys they have between them about to leave home, they're looking for a new adventure and a complete change of lifestyle. Scarlette Douglas shows them five properties in the sunny south of Gran Canaria for their budget of £175,000

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: A history buff tries to launch guided tours in Normandy, and on their rural retreat in Portugal, a family unveil their new eco loo

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: in Cardiff, DJ Trishna hopes her cooking will be even better than her rapping, as she hosts a hip-hop themed night in a bid to scoop the £1000 prize. However, when Yuno shakes his booty on the dance floor, opera-loving Nick is unimpressed and flirty Michelle lets her hands do the talking

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: It's the second day of the competition in Cardiff and Nick is planning to bring some refinement and fine dining to the week's proceedings. However, fastidious Nick really has set himself a mountain to climb with a massive tasting menu

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the third day in Cardiff, retail manager Yuno hopes to scoop the prize by whisking his guests off to the Himalayas. As well as entertaining his guests with some traditional dancing, Yuno's also hoping to tickle their taste buds by serving up Nepalese food

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: It's day four of the competition in Cardiff and turn of self-appointed 'hostess with the mostest' Michelle. She's out to impress with a culinary trip around the world, but when she sets a fun challenge, she ends up being accused of cheating

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the final night of the competition in Cardiff, host Suzanne is pinning her hopes on an evening of sophistication and fine French cuisine. Suzanne's menu is inspired by her many holidays to France - in fact she's been every year for the last 17 years. However, revealing the inspiration behind her starter might be a step too far for her guests, especially after the revelations found inside her 'special' cupboard!

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Childhood sweethearts Laura and Nick dream of making a permanent move to Spain with their beloved dog Poppy. They're after a property in Estepona on Spain's Costa del Sol that meets both their needs and Poppy's. Property expert Jean Johansson lines up five options for their £160,000 budget

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: House hunter Zane wants to permanently relocate to Mijas in Spain to be closer to his son Dean, who has already moved there with his family. Danni Menzies shows the father and son five properties within the £110,000 budget, hoping at least one will prove perfect

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: In 2010, architectural designer Lincoln Miles and artist Lisa Traxler found an uninspiring 1970s bungalow on a plot on the Isle of Wight surrounded by ancient woodland. As part of their renovation project, they added a three-storey 'tower' extension and used a range of unconventional techniques and alternative materials. Two years later, Kevin McCloud returned to find out whether the couple's methods led to success

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It
programme.desc: In Bradford, West Yorkshire, Michelle is tired of the abode she shares with Andrew. The bungalow, set in rolling hills, is small and was only supposed to be a temporary home - that was a decade ago. However, Andrew loves this place. Kirstie tries to convince Michelle to stay by solving her kitchen problem and adding some feminine touches to the decor. Phil, meanwhile, has found a selection of amazing properties to buy - including a bungalow that's twice the size and a barn conversion with lots of outside space

programme.title: In the Footsteps of Killers
programme.desc: Emilia Fox and criminologist David Wilson investigate the disappearance of 13-year-old David Spencer and 11-year-old Patrick Warren, who went missing in Birmingham on Boxing Day in 1996. To this day, no one has been charged with the double disappearance and murder of the two friends, and their bodies have never been found despite two major police investigations and a missing persons campaign that featured the boys' pictures on milk cartons. But now, Emilia and David discover new evidence leading to a prime suspect

programme.title: Passengers (2016)
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Sci-fi drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen

programme.title: Scared of the Dark
programme.desc: Danny Dyer presents the final of the pitch-black contest, which sees the celebrities more reliant on each other than ever. As Chris Eubank, Paul Gascoigne, Max George, Nicola Adams, Chris McCausland, Scarlett Moffatt, Donna Preston and Chloe Burrows compete to earn some precious moments in the light, their bond is at an all-time high. But that could all change when each of them are presented with a leap-of-faith task that could impact the entire group's future in the competition

programme.title: Celebrity Hunted
programme.desc: Ed and James bait the hunters into a showdown at Taskmaster House while Nik and Eva taunt them with a public appearance in Leicester Square and on the Heart Radio breakfast show. Katya and Aimee head up to Carlisle to reunite with some friends and Saffron and Bobby lay low on the south coast

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Kiell Smith-Bynoe finds himself playing bingo without any shoes on, Mae Martin plays an unusual but potentially brilliant drum solo and all the comedians create boats to carry eggs, in a race involving eggs in boats. Greg Davies hands out the scores, while Alex Horne hands out the tasks, designed to test the comedians' daring, dexterity and dignity under pressure - and to also make them look a little bit silly too

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Sarah from Plymouth becomes the first ever returning picker having previously been on the show as David. Now proudly pansexual and living as a woman, Sarah can't wait to road test her new body and hopes her first date as a woman will be everything she has dreamed of. Twenty year-old plumber Jamie from Swansea is fed up with being hit on by OAPs at work, he comes into the studio looking for love

They want to incorporate extravagant touches such as a chandelier above the bath, vintage swan-shaped gold taps, and a natural stone wall built out of stones reclaimed onsite. Elsewhere, Mark meets first-time renovator Alanna in the West Midlands, who is building a sleek, minimal, all-white kitchen for £10,000

programme.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun
programme.desc: Cameras focus on Jan and her son Glen. She moved to Saydo in Andalucia 17 years ago with her husband Ken, who passed away over the summer. To celebrate Ken's love of a good knees-up, Glen's putting on the biggest party Saydo's ever seen. Plus, a look at Benalmadena, where Laura and Phil, together with six of their friends back in the UK, have bought two bars. John Thomson narrates

programme.title: Shoplifters & Scammers: At War with the Law
programme.desc: At West Orchards in Coventry, senior officer Lewis turns detective when a stallholder reports a theft an hour after it happened. He reviews the CCTV footage, pinpoints the incident and tracks down the perpetrator outside the shopping centre. A department store calls in a suspected perfume theft, but until they can review their footage and confirm it security officer Mal keeps track of the suspect on CCTV

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Harrow Housing Enforcement Officer Sheetal Rajani is carrying out a series of surprise inspections when a distressed tenant approaches her. Sharon, a single mother of three, has been living with rats, bed bugs and damp. Her landlord believes the problem comes from the flat upstairs, but the landlord upstairs is not allowing them access

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: The driver of a suspected stolen car seems determined to escape at all costs, with several police cars rammed and badly damaged during a hair-raising pursuit along a dual carriageway. programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Jamie Theakston presents as Derbyshire's finest pursue law breakers in the heart of the country. A BMW car skids on the wet road into the motorway's central barrier

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: A failure to stop in Hartlepool turns into an armed stand-off and a full-blown kidnapping situation, while a 14-year-old boy is found in possession of a bag of crack cocaine, cash and a knife. Lee goes on a high-speed pursuit through Stockton, and Jacko and Simon tackle a drug driver who is wearing a balaclava

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: AJ and Richie are in pursuit of a van speeding through narrow country lanes, while Jacko and the team box in a van carrying large quantities of cannabis. Sparks fly when dog handler Justin and police dog Elsa capture two burglars on a building site

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: During a dramatic pursuit, Faulko is rammed off the road at 80mph and has to be rushed to hospital, while the team battles to tackle the aftermath of the crash, and track down the driver responsible. Luke has something really big to tell the family, while Sue and Noel face the biggest decision of their lives - whether to have another baby or decide that 22 kids is enough

programme.desc: A former prisoner visits the surgery with a long list of health concerns, and Dr Anna Graham focuses on the most urgent, infected cigarette burns inflicted by other inmates. Abigail, aged 20, is treated for a painful neck injury caused by a riding fall, and 28-year-old Laura is brought in having a severe asthma attack. programme.desc: Documentary about Zephany Nurse, a newborn baby stolen from hospital in Cape Town in 1997, and the extraordinary circumstances that reunited her with her long lost family. For 17 years her parents searched for her, until in 2015 Zephany was found by coincidence at their second daughter Cassidy's new school. The Nurses were overjoyed, but the arrest and trial of the woman whom Zephany knew as her loving mother devastated her, and she chose to remain with the kidnapper's family

programme.desc: The parents of a baby given up for adoption could provide a clue to the death of a new mother - but the investigation also turns up long-buried family secrets. The detectives are forced to consider the possibility that racial prejudice played a part in the case

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy tries to trap a crooked lawyer who bribes his clients - but as he tries to track down the man's accomplice, he realises the investigation has placed his own job on the line. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The aftermath of Harper Dearing's bomb attack on the NCIS headquarters dominates proceedings. As rescue crews sift through the debris searching for survivors, Abby, Gibbs, McGee and Vance are accounted for, but Ziva and Tony are trapped in a lift. Dearing makes contact after his ex-wife is taken into custody, enabling his car to be traced to an abandoned lot - and the agents arrive just in time to see the vehicle blow up. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team investigate the death of an armoury employee when divers find her body in a car at the bottom of a lake. The victim had been reported missing since she was evacuated before the blast at NCIS headquarters. Meanwhile, crisis counsellor Miles Wolf carries out psychological assessments of all the agents in the wake of the bombings. Guest starring Steve Valentine (Crossing Jordan)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: While on medical leave, Ducky reopens a 12-year-old case by talking officials at a cemetery into releasing the body of a navy commander whose post-mortem he carried out 12 years previously. Meanwhile, the team is called in to investigate the death of a sergeant from carbon monoxide poisoning - and finds a copy of Ducky's exhumation request on the man's laptop. Crime drama, starring David McCallum

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A boy disappears after meeting up with an online gamer, while Benson suspects her son is being bullied

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A poet's girlfriend is murdered while on her way to ask a favour of a patron, and Nichols and Wheeler's investigation reveals a complex web of relationships surrounding the literary publication they both worked for. The man who had been funding the magazine, Don McCallum, had been intending to end his support, and the detectives discover the poet had been very close to a married woman

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate the murder of a 14-year-old immigrant girl, and initially suspect the involvement of a thug with a history of violence - but the case is complicated by the discovery that the victim was married to a 35-year-old polygamist

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A socialite's body is found in Central Park, and detectives Benson and Stabler initially suspect her wealthy boyfriend of murder. However, the investigation reveals the victim has been living a double life, posing as a homeless teenager - and the team discovers a street family loyal to its sinister leader. Starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate a case of alleged child abuse, but soon realise their attention should actually be focused on the woman who made the report. Hard-hitting drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.desc: Danica and Kate's wedding is thrown into a chaos when a storm traps the wedding guests on a Muskoka island

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.desc: Shade and Angie find themselves tangled up in the world of travelling funfairs when a carnival worker's body is found

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces across the UK to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to fight the huge rise in street crime. In London, the Met's robbery squads work the streets on a busy Friday night, and with criminals now using motorbikes to get away, cameras help officers identify, track and apprehend offenders. Nick also finds out how pickpockets, scammers and bag thieves use sleight of hand and distraction to relieve people of their valuables

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a Navy commander last seen in the company of a mysterious blonde woman, who turns out to be missing NCIS agent and Tony's ex-lover EJ Barrett. She identifies the murderer as Seal-turned-assassin Marcellus Dane, who is suspected of working for Casey Stratton - a member of black ops unit Phantom Eight. Guest starring Sarah Jane Morris

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An estate agent and two clients discover the body of Lt Com Maya Burris, a naval attache who had been working in Egypt, and her detective husband Nick arrives on the scene to demand answers. Using documents discovered on the victim's boat, Abby links her to Barry Norton, who is suspected of having sold government secrets to a Middle Eastern terrorist group known as the SRC

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs goes into his favourite diner for a cup of coffee and finds himself staring down the barrel of a gun, forcing him to question choices he has made in the past and present. The action then flashes back a few days to when he and the rest of the team members were investigating the death of a petty officer on board USS Gentry, which has been undergoing repairs in dry dock. The 200th episode of the crime drama, starring Mark Harmon

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Conclusion of a three-part story. The investigation into a movie studio boss's murder becomes further complicated when fresh evidence points to yet another suspect. Meanwhile, the ex-husband of the deceased goes to trial to face accusations of having a hand in the crime - is an innocent man about to be convicted? Sam Waterston stars

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A woman is attacked and killed just hours after a serial rapist is freed on parole, prompting McCoy to pull out all the stops to bring him to justice - but before long the detective realises the wanted man could be innocent. Drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A carjacking turns nasty when an off-duty police officer is killed and the driver is kidnapped. Luckily, Briscoe and Curtis capture one of the perpetrators, who offers to reveal the whereabouts of the missing driver to DA Ross - in exchange for immunity on the cop-killing charge. Crime drama, starring Sam Waterston and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An answering machine message leads Briscoe and Curtis to reopen an investigation into an arson attack that killed a girl - but the 15-year-old suspect has a powerful ally in his grandfather, an influential force in political spheres. Award-winning police drama, guest starring Robert Vaughn (Hustle) alongside Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The murder of a Middle Eastern man sends Briscoe and Curtis racing to thwart a suspected terrorist plot to bring destruction to New York - and leads them to uncover a domestic conspiracy involving horrific female circumcision. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy faces bad memories when a drunk driver kills three people - and finds himself forced to protect the perpetrator in the process. Award-winning police drama, starring Benjamin Bratt and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called in to investigate when three dehydrated survivors from a helicopter crash are discovered. The pilot is initially missing, but his body later washes ashore with a gunshot wound to the head. Things get complicated when one of the crew members tells the agents the chopper was hit by another aircraft, while another states that the pilot tried to kill them all by crashing into the sea on purpose. American drama, starring Mark Harmon and David McCallum

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The driver of a Ferrari is gunned down by a motorcyclist and the victim is identified as petty officer Colin Boxer, who was holding down a second job as a valet parker and had borrowed the sports car. The owner of the vehicle turns out to be Vijay Chaya, the billionaire head of a large corporation, and the team suspects a case of mistaken identity. During the course of the investigation, Gibbs chances on a medal awarded to Leroy Jethro Moore, the man he was named after and an estranged friend of his father. Guest starring Billy Dee Williams (The Empire Strikes Back) and Ralph Waite (The Waltons)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. First lieutenant Michael Torres gets involved in a fight before falling to the ground, and is found beaten to death the next morning. The only witness is his friend and colleague Captain Joe Westcott, who suffers from post-traumatic stress disorder and has trouble distinguishing reality from his past military experiences in the Middle East

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A San Diego stalker is killing brunette, female college students in a variety of gruesome ways and BAU's new addition Ashley Seaver needs to prove her worth before more teenagers meet the same grisly fate. Drama, starring Rachel Nichols and David Rossi

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Morgan, Hotch and the team find themselves on the trail of a murderer with a worrying penchant for photography, and their investigation reveals there is more to the suspect than they first thought. Crime drama, starring Shemar Moore

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Lake team up with FBI agent Lauren Cooper to track down a serial killer who has claimed the lives of more than 20 women - but discover that he too has been murdered. The investigation leads them to a warehouse where they find a hidden torture chamber containing a surviving victim - but she later dies, shutting down a vital line of inquiry and complicating the case still further

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A violent sexual assault on a boy draws Benson and Stabler into a culture clash between Orthodox Jews and the secular authorities - but the investigation ultimately leads them to a 14-year-old with a penchant for preying on younger children. Starring Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate a rape case involving a girl and her older sister's boyfriend, but when questioned, the suspect claims he committed the crime in his sleep. When a tip-off leads the detectives to a popular online game, they discover what happened to the victim's older sibling, who mysteriously disappeared. Crime drama, starring Mariska Hargitay and Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man is accused of murdering two Arab-Americans - but his attorney mounts a novel defence, claiming he was compelled to kill because he is genetically predisposed toward hatred and violence. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An autistic man dies in police custody, and when Briscoe and Logan investigate, they discover he was receiving a number of unusual and illegal treatments. The inquiry also sheds light on the deceased's parents, who seem reluctant to pursue a prosecution

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to bring criminals to justice. The programme reveals how essential surveillance cameras have become in the fight against crime and features footage of people caught red-handed

programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy captain wearing a colourful costume underneath his uniform is shot and killed in a flower shop, and further investigation reveals he was leading a double life as a masked vigilante. Vance brings in Tony's ex-fiancee, journalist Wendy Miller, who claims the victim had been trying to expose a scandal, and as the team pursues the case, a real-estate scam is uncovered. Guest starring Perrey Reeves (Entourage)

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy reservist is found dead in his home with marks around his neck, and Gibbs and the team discover he was working on a highly classified case for the department of defence. The circumstances surrounding the man's demise lead the investigators to suspect someone was secretly trying to drive him insane, bringing them into contact with Samantha Ryan, the director of a division specialising in psychological warfare. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Chief petty officer Leland Wiley dies of a heart attack just as he is about to reveal information on elusive arms dealer Agah Bayar. The team discovers the cardiac arrest was caused by someone hacking into a computer monitoring Wiley's pacemaker and increasing his heart rate to 400bpm. Meanwhile, a probationary agent tries to impress Gibbs and win a place on his team. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, with Tamer Hassan and Matt L Jones

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives probe the shooting of a motorist, and arrest a man who helped the victim change a tyre on his car shortly before he was killed. The suspect protests his innocence, and points the investigators in the direction of another man who admits to the crime and even signs a confession, but further inquiries cast doubt on his guilt. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the death of a book editor who was reputedly having an affair with one of her authors, and find themselves focusing on the lover's long-time companion, whose alibi turns out to be a tissue of lies. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the murder of a model and discover splashes of blood that obviously did not come from the victim, but suggest the culprit is a relative. With Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy and Ross investigate when a restaurant becomes the scene of a shooting, and discover one of the diners is concealing a desire for revenge. Unfortunately, the object of their suspicion has a clever defence already up her sleeve - and only an expert witness can break her story. Sam Waterston and Carey Lowell star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A charity worker with a secret appetite for sordid encounters dies at the hands of a serial killer, but the defendant constructs a unique case by claiming the crime was the result of exposure to excessive violence on television. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Carey Lowell

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives investigate when a male nurse is found beaten to within an inch of his life - but as they draw closer to their prime suspects, the shocking motives for the attack become clear. Gritty police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. Tony reviews satellite footage of rebel forces in the Middle East and spots Kersey among a group of insurgents, concluding that Joe Westcott's fear of him was well-founded. Back at HQ, Abby creates a 3D computer model of the attack that occurred in Afghanistan and Joe dons a virtual-reality headset to relive the traumatic events. Will it jog his memory?

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Teenager Lydia Wade manages to escape a gang of masked men trying to abduct her and her friend Rosie, the daughter of a US Navy commander. Lydia's Navy captain father David Wade was shot dead during the attack and her mother is overseas, so Ziva offers to look after the girl, while Abby tries to jog her memory by creating facial reconstructions of the attackers based on some grainy CCTV footage. DiNozzo and McGee find links on Rosie's laptop to possible suspect John 'Diesel' Stevens

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs is called to the scene when there is an attempt on the life of FBI agent TC Fornell, with the assailant identified as Navy seaman Tyler Brown. The pair team up and visit the bar where Brown worked and bump into their mutual ex-wife Diane Sterling, who was operating undercover as an employee suspected of stealing customers' identities. Joe Spano and Melinda McGraw guest star

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny and Jackie investigate an attempted acid attack on prominent TV reporter Melanie Maines - and are stunned to discover Frank has been having a secret fling with her. Meanwhile, Jamie's undercover mission puts him in danger when he learns of a gangland killing - and discovers he could be framed for the crime. Guest starring Margaret Colin (The Devil's Own)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A number of fertilised embryos are stolen from a sperm bank and the team's investigation reveals several unhappy customers - as well as a couple of outspoken anti-fertility activists who liken such clinics to death camps. Before long, Benson and Stabler have their suspects in custody - but a shocking turn of events at the courthouse turns the case into a murder. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson goes undercover in a prison to investigate a teenage girl's claims that a guard raped her and has been threatening her jailed mother. Posing as an inmate, she tries to find evidence that systematic abuse is taking place - and faces a terrifying ordeal in the basement of the facility. Starring Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An accusation that a teacher coerced a 15-year-old student into having sex with her is met with the counterclaim by the now-pregnant woman that she was raped. Novak obtains a warrant preventing her from securing an abortion and subsequent DNA tests confirm the boy as the child's father. Huang's suggestion that a personality disorder drew her to the youngster is undermined by incriminating evidence that casts new light on the case. Guest starring Melissa Joan Hart (Sabrina the Teenage Witch)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the attempted murder of a woman found beaten into a coma, and their only witness is her daughter, who has severe learning difficulties. The spotlight soon turns on the victim's husband, who claims to have found his wife on his return home from a business trip - but the airline passenger list reveals he was not on the flight. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.desc: An old enemy of Angie fakes his own death, then hires her to investigate who is trying to kill him. Guest starring William Shatner

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Two surprise sniper attacks on the NYPD leave the SVU squad scrambling for answers. When the link between the shootings appears to be Detective Tutuola, he reconnects with his former Narcotics partner to uncover a possible motive tied to their old cases. As the violence continues, Lieutenant Eames joins the investigation and the unit races to hunt down a killer no one saw coming

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to bring criminals to justice. In Hammersmith, west London, camera operators help police as they try to enforce a drinking ban on a local park and spot a group whose members may be about to break into a shop
